name: ‚ùñ Outline Text Field 1.31
description:
Hi everyone, finally, I made these near-perfect outline text fields for personal use and thought about publishing it and letting others use this because I found it very useful.


You may ask what's the difference between this "Text field" and the others; here are some key differences:


  • has rounded edges
  • has no background for text field title
  • has auto height and manual height variants
  • Also, it's almost fully responsive!


I have a tutorial for how I made this on Youtube, but it's in Persian. However, you can watch it with subtitles if you're interested.

https://youtu.be/zPQK237Obcs


I hope it helps.

Good luck!
